descriptionHtml:
For any Steam users information I had permission from the Creator to put them on here I will add the others soon so do not think I stole this its not mine at all I didn't do anything, but open it up to the nexus users.

This Mod adds Three well of Urd which modify the artifacts. One of these locations is Seer's Retreat.

the location of Seers Retreat is in the images section.

Now for anyone out there who is new to this mod or doesn't use the Steam Workshop or both.
This Mod doesn't affect the artifacts in any way it just opens up new versions of it.

A side note would be that the improved Auriel's bows can't do the effect with the arrows I';; upload that mod another time and be patient please.
author: Zim
